message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a novel model-free actor-critic reinforcement-learning algorithm for continuous states and discrete actions, with off-policy critics. This work is related to the field of machine learning and artificial intelligence, specifically in the area of reinforcement learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely categories. The algorithm is designed for robotic applications, which suggests that it could also be relevant to the field of robotics, hence cs.RO (Robotics) is also a likely category. The paper also mentions that the algorithm is evaluated on a variety of tasks, some of which involve image processing, suggesting that cs.CV (Computer Vision) could also be a relevant category. Finally, the paper proposes a new approach to exploration, which could be relevant to the field of control systems, hence cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also a possible category.
